nodes.title: Luxshare Precision
nodes.short_description: Primary AirPods assembler; shifts output and capacity directly affect supply.

nodes.title: Goertek
nodes.short_description: Major AirPods assembler; order changes have immediate production impact.

nodes.title: AAC Technologies
nodes.short_description: Supplies speakers and acoustic modules essential to AirPods audio and ANC.

nodes.title: Knowles Corporation
nodes.short_description: Provides MEMS microphones critical for voice, ANC, and transparency modes.

nodes.title: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC)
nodes.short_description: Fabs Apple-designed H-series chips powering AirPods; capacity affects launches.

nodes.title: Amperex Technology Limited (ATL)
nodes.short_description: Supplies lithium-polymer batteries; cell availability and performance drive product design and life.

nodes.title: Samsung Galaxy Buds
nodes.short_description: Direct competitor influencing AirPods pricing, features, and marketing.

nodes.title: Sony WF-1000XM series
nodes.short_description: Flagship ANC earbuds rival shaping AirPods Pro feature expectations.

nodes.title: Bluetooth
nodes.short_description: Wireless standard required for AirPods connectivity and interoperability.

nodes.title: European Union Common Charger Directive (USB-C)
nodes.short_description: Mandates USB-C charging, forcing AirPods case connector transition.

nodes.title: Federal Communications Commission (FCC)
nodes.short_description: Regulatory approval needed for AirPods radio emissions and spectrum compliance.

nodes.title: China
nodes.short_description: Core manufacturing hub for AirPods components and assembly.

nodes.title: Vietnam
nodes.short_description: Key AirPods assembly location reducing China concentration and tariff exposure.

nodes.title: U.S.â€“China trade war
nodes.short_description: Tariffs and restrictions triggered AirPods production diversification to Vietnam.

nodes.title: COVID-19 pandemic
nodes.short_description: Factory shutdowns and logistics disruptions constrained AirPods supply and launches.
